name: Reapers Creepers
description:
You're Grimble, a new associate reaper who has now come under the ire of the Head Grim Reaper and his watchful eye. Grimble has lost a few souls.... catch them before the Head Reaper discovers this costly mistake. Using Grimble and his trusty scythe help Grimble get back the souls and earn the coveted title of Grim.

Player Controls:

  1. Move: A,D
  2. Jump: Space
  3. Throw Scythe: Left Click
  4. Teleport to Scythe: Right Click
